CustomField.formula: IF( ISBLANK( UserGem__CurrentContact__r.OwnerId ), IF( ISBLANK( UserGem__CurrentLead__r.OwnerId ), NULL, IF( LEFT( UserGem__CurrentLead__r.OwnerId , 3) = "OOG", UserGem__CurrentLead__r.Owner:Queue.QueueName , UserGem__CurrentLead__r.Owner:User.FirstName & " " & UserGem__CurrentLead__r.Owner:User.LastName ) ), UserGem__CurrentContact__r.Owner.FirstName & " " & UserGem__CurrentContact__r.Owner.LastName )
CustomField.label: Owner
